name: Tomasz Lee

Strong background in developing distributed systems and microservices architectures, armed with knowledge in containerization using **Docker** and orchestration with **Kubernetes**. Proven record in delivering scalable and robust solutions, enhancing development efficiencies, and optimizing application performance. Equipped with excellent collaboration and project leadership skills to drive cross-functional team success.
